The temple Sacred poems and private ejaculations. By Mr. George Herbert. Herbert, George, 1593-1633. Ferrar, Nicholas, 1592-1637.
[8], 192, [4] p.
Printed by Thom. Buck, and Roger Daniel, printers to the Universitie, Cambridge : 1633.
Edited by Nicholas Ferrar. In verse. Includes index. A variant of the edition with F. Green's name in the imprint. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
